query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `cancellationSurveys` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `reason` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `feedbackText` text,
  `offeredDiscount` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `acceptedDiscount` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `idx_cancelSurvey_userId` (`userId`),
  INDEX `idx_cancelSurvey_reason` (`reason`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_cancelSurvey_userId` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
command:
